summary: I HAVE A 2005 CHEVY IMPALA IT HAS AROUND 44000 MILES. I HAVE HAD IT ABOUT ONE YEAR,ABOUT A MONTH AGO MY WIFE WAS DRIVING HOME AFTER DROPPING ME OFF IT WAS ABOUT 2 IN THE MORNING SHE WAS ABOUT 10 MILES FROM THE HOUSE AND THE HEAD LIGHT WENT OUT ON HER. SHE GOT THE CAR STOPPED AND AFTER ABOUT 15 MINS THEY CAME BACK ON, SO SHE STARTED TO GO AGAIN GOT ABOUT 5 MORE MILES AND THEY WENT OUT AGAIN.   AFTER ABOUT 10 MINS THEY CAME BACK ON.  THERE HAS BEEN NO PROBLEMS FOR ABOUT 3 WEEKS. THEN AGAIN THE OTHER NIGHT THEY DID THE SAME THING BUT THIS TIME SHE WAS GOING AROUND A CURVE IN THE ROAD (THANK GOD SHE KNEW THE ROAD) NOW SHE ONLY DRIVES THE CAR AFTER DARK IF SHE HAS TO. *TR
